name: Spinny Bird
description:
Spinny Bird is a cute one-button action game inspired by Chiritori where you have to eat as much fruit as you can!

How to play: 

  • The bird will spin in place automatically
  • Hold the play button or spacebar to make the bird fly straight in the direction it's facing
  • When you release the button, the bird will stop and spin in place again

Game modes: 

  • Endless: Avoid the spikes while collecting fruit! As your score increases, the speed and number of spikes will increase too.
  • Blitz: Collect as many fruit as you can in 60 seconds. As your score increases, you speed does too.

Fruit values:

  • Apple: 1 pt.
  • Orange: 2 pts.
  • Pear: 3 pts.
  • Banana: 5 pts.

Unlock special characters with your high score in Endless Mode! Earn at least:

  • 25 points to unlock the Star hero
  • 50 points to unlock the Bug hero
  • 100 points to unlock the Bat hero

Credits: 

  • Game by Christian Montoya
  • Artwork by Gabe Fern
